title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works (Dub)
alternative_title: 劇場版 Fate/stay night: UNLIMITED BLADE WORKS
description: This is the adaptation of the 2nd route of the popular visual novel: Fate/Stay Night. In this route, Tohsaka Rin will be the major female character. Revelations about Shirou and his destiny will be made.
